events.message: I purchased a jacket last week and received the wrong size. I would like to request a refund because the item does not fit me and I cannot exchange it.
The case has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to the wrong size item received.
The case has been assigned to customer service agent Sarah M. to handle the refund request.

Here is my order number 987654321 and attached are photos showing the wrong size jacket I received instead of the medium I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide a prepaid shipping label for you to return the incorrect jacket.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and for making the refund process clear and easy for me.

We are closing this case now as the refund has been processed and the return shipment is underway. Thank you for your cooperation.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to your email. We appreciate your feedback to help us improve our service.
